leadership.name: Alexandra Rodriguez
leadership.title: Chief Executive Officer
leadership.bio: Alexandra brings over 15 years of experience in technology leadership and business strategy. She has successfully led multiple technology companies through periods of rapid growth and digital transformation. Prior to founding SourceCloud, she served as CTO at a Fortune 500 company where she led the modernization of legacy systems and implementation of cloud-first strategies.
leadership.shortBio: Technology leader with 15+ years experience driving digital transformation and business growth.
achievements: Increased company valuation by 300% in 3 years

leadership.name: Marcus Johnson
leadership.title: Chief Technology Officer
leadership.bio: Marcus is a technology visionary with expertise in cloud architecture, DevOps, and emerging technologies. He has architected scalable solutions for companies ranging from startups to enterprise organizations. His passion for innovation drives SourceCloud's technology strategy and ensures we stay ahead of industry trends.
leadership.shortBio: Technology architect and innovation leader with deep expertise in cloud and emerging technologies.
achievements: Led migration of 100+ applications to cloud

leadership.name: Sarah Chen
leadership.title: Chief Operations Officer
leadership.bio: Sarah oversees all operational aspects of SourceCloud, ensuring seamless service delivery and exceptional client experiences. With a background in consulting and operations management, she has optimized processes for numerous technology companies and built high-performing teams.
leadership.shortBio: Operations expert focused on delivering exceptional client experiences and building high-performing teams.

leadership.name: David Kim
leadership.title: Vice President of Talent Acquisition
leadership.bio: David leads SourceCloud's talent acquisition strategy, specializing in technology recruitment and team building. With over a decade of experience in technical recruiting, he has built teams for some of the most innovative companies in the industry.
leadership.shortBio: Technology recruitment expert with proven track record of building world-class engineering teams.

leadership.name: Emily Watson
leadership.title: Vice President of Consulting Services
leadership.bio: Emily leads SourceCloud's consulting practice, delivering strategic technology guidance to clients across industries. Her expertise spans digital transformation, technology strategy, and organizational change management.
leadership.shortBio: Strategic technology consultant with deep expertise in digital transformation and organizational change.
achievements: Published thought leadership on technology strategy

leadership.name: Robert Thompson
leadership.title: Vice President of Integration Services
leadership.bio: Robert specializes in system integration and API development, helping organizations connect their technology ecosystems. With expertise in modern integration patterns and cloud platforms, he ensures seamless data flow and process automation.
leadership.shortBio: Integration expert focused on connecting technology ecosystems and automating business processes.

values.title: Innovation
values.description: We stay ahead of technology trends and continuously innovate our solutions.

values.title: Excellence
values.description: We deliver exceptional results and maintain the highest standards of quality.

values.title: Collaboration
values.description: We work closely with clients and partners to achieve shared success.

values.title: Integrity
values.description: We operate with transparency, honesty, and ethical business practices.
